apis.name: List group milestones
apis.description: Returns a list of group milestones.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: iids[]
attributes.description: Return only the milestones having the given iid (Note: ignored if include_parent_milestones is set as true)

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Return only active or closed milestones

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Return only the milestones having the given title

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Return only milestones with a title or description matching the provided string

attributes.name: include_parent_milestones
attributes.description: Include milestones from parent group and its ancestors. Introduced in GitLab 13.4

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: milestone_id
attributes.description: The ID of the group milestone

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of a milestone

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of the milestone

attributes.name: due_date
attributes.description: The due date of the milestone, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

attributes.name: start_date
attributes.description: The start date of the milestone, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: milestone_id
attributes.description: The ID of a group milestone

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of a milestone

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of a milestone

attributes.name: due_date
attributes.description: The due date of the milestone, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

attributes.name: start_date
attributes.description: The start date of the milestone, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

attributes.name: state_event
attributes.description: The state event of the milestone (close or activate)
